ðŸ“– Summary: Monarch is a Go ORM designed to simplify MongoDB interactions. It offers a collection API for performing common database operations such as querying, updating, deleting, and saving data. Monarch aims to provide an easier and less repetitive way to interact with MongoDB compared to using the standard Go driver directly.
